name: ShoppaTube
tag_list: shopping, shop-online, e-commerce-platforms, video-syndication, video-reviews, affiliate-marketing
overview:
ShoppaTube combines video reviews, video syndication and product purchasing in one user-friendly and fun platform.

Predicted to be eaten-up by the consumer market and savvy internet marketers, shoppaTube gives reviewers an easy way to share and earn revenue from their video reviews. It syndicates video reviews through multiple platforms such as YouTube and Tube Mogul.

It provides â€œshoppasâ€ with an extremely helpful way to find the best products, via real reviews from real people and integrates a secure shopping platform to buy the product reviewed.

ShoppaTube is currently in closed beta.
